name: Perlin Noise | Version 1 | Discolight
description: I wanted to make Perlin Noise in a circle with different sizes and colors of the dots. Making it a disco ball lamp.

name: Perlin Noise | Version 2 | Moonlight
description: The goal was to make the Perlin Noise look like a moon.

name: Tree Rings | Version 1 | Old tree
description: I was inspired by the ´Radial Perlin Noise and Generative Tree Rings´ tutorial and played with the number of points and rings to create a more rustic feeling.

name: Tree Rings | Version 2 | Waving flag
description: I wanted to make something 'Real' and not abstract, so I ended up with making a waving flag.

name: Tree Rings | Version 3 | 3D
description: The goal was to keep the circle structure from the tree rings, but give it more depth.

name: Flow Fields | Version 1 | Lightning Strikes
description: I wanted the flow field to look like lightning, but ended up making them slower than planned since it was too disturbing for the eyes.

name: Flow Fields | Version 2 | Fire's Catching
description: The aim was to manipulate the flow field to make it look like flames and fire.

name: Tone JS | Version 1 | Fireworks By Night
description: I wanted to interact sound and art with mouseclick, and I wanted it to look like fireworks in the night.
